analyzed: om namaḥ śrī vajrayoginyai
deva asura nara vandita caraṇe bhava magna uddharaṇa arpita caraṇe

original: tvayi rodimi nutisavyapadeśaḥ kiṃ paśyasi punaraniśamaśeṣam || 1 ||
analyzed: tvayi rodimi nuti sa vyapadeśaḥ kim paśyasi punar aniśam aśeṣam

original: mātardevi kirasi kaṇamuṣṭiṃ janayad yajñasutaḥ kimatuṣṭim |
analyzed: mātar devi kirasi kaṇa muṣṭim janayat yajñasutaḥ kim atuṣṭim

original: vajravārāhi narāhisurāṇāṃ tvaṃ śaraṇaṃ tava nāmaparāṇām || 2 ||
analyzed: vajra vārāhi nara ahi surāṇām tvam śaraṇam tava nāma parāṇām
hari kara ri
śikhi phaṇi taskara bhītiḥ tvad para citte nā eva sameti

original: mātardevi nibhālaya mahyaṃ kiṃ sahase mama duḥkhamasahyam || 3 ||
analyzed: mātar devi nibhālaya mahyam kim sahase mama duḥkham asahyam
dhāriṇi duṣṭam tuṣṭaya māra nivāriṇi
abhinava komala kara caraṇa aṅgi trivali samucchada sapta vibhaṅgi
grāhya grāhaka bhāva viśuddhe pāda kara aṅguli jāla pinaddhe
āyata pārśva aṅguli kara caraṇe dhvasta vyādhi ja rāja nimaraṇe
udgata reṇuḥ ūrdhva gata romā vajra yoga vivṛta amṛta dhāmā
bāla marīci vilokana rakte jagatām duḥkha nirākṛti śakte
su bhru tanu udari madhya kṛśa aṅgi karṇa anta āyata locana bhṛṅgi bhaṅgi
ḍākinye va hi

original: viśvamaśeṣaṃ loko vetti na te bahuveṣam || 7 ||
analyzed: viśvam aśeṣam lokaḥ vetti na te bahu veṣam
yatnam ṛte jagat artha samṛddhiḥ cintita mātra jana īpsita siddhiḥ

original: mūḍho vetti na duṣkṛtakarma prāvṛṣīva na śilāṅkurajanma || 8 ||
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ vetti na duṣkṛta karma prāvṛṣi iva na śilā aṅkura janma
andhaḥ iva arka śaśāṅka ādarśī pāpa janaḥ hi anubhāva sparśī

original: cintāmaṇimajñā na vidanti prajñe tvasya phalāni phalanti || 9 ||
analyzed: cintāmaṇim ajñāḥ na vidanti prajñe tu asya phalāni phalanti  /
cakra aṅkita kara pāda manojñe jñāna anala bhasmīkṛta saṅge
kāya vacana manasā kṛta duritam rāga dveṣa moha parikarilitam

original: taddiśāmi tava devi samakṣaṃ yāvadyāmi na durgatipakṣam |
analyzed: tat diśāmi tava devi samakṣam yāvat yāmi na durgati pakṣam

original: manaḥ paramārthaṃ tanustava vedī sa bhavati naiva duritaparikhedī || 11 ||
analyzed: manaḥ parama artham tanuḥ tava vedī sa bhavati nā eva durita parikhedī
lakṣaṇa nikhila a lakṣita gātre sakala anuvyañjana gata pātre
nava yauvana mada manthara piṇḍe cala kuṇḍala yuga maṇḍita gaṇḍe
tuṅga nitamba ghana stana bhāre galaka ālambi niraṃśu kaṅkuśa hāre
saṃvara madhupa vicumbi mukha abje tad bhuja yuga parirabdha hṛd abje
nirbhara surata sukha avikala akṣi mukta śiroruha vasana nirapekṣe
heru kara āhu daṣṭa mukha candre sa smita racita hū hū kṛta mantre
pati mauli sthita vidhum amṛṣantī kimu candra arkau vapuḥ amuṣantī
mātar te jagat anupama rūpam tat vicāraya paramārtha sa svarūpam
kleśa dāhiṃha
śamana amṛta vacanam tad vineya jana śuddhi viracanam
padminī iti nalina amala gandhaḥ karuṇā para jagat artha nibandhaḥ
divya sudhā adhara gata
pratyaṅga sparśa upya nimittam sahaja ambudhi viplāvita cittam

original: kiṃ tvaṃ mātaḥ kariṣyasi tābhiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśacchatakoṭyabalābhiḥ |
analyzed: kim tvam mātar kariṣyasi tābhiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat śata koṭi abalābhiḥ

original: yadyanyāṃ manute bahutātastadvihāya jhagiti dehi nu mātaḥ || 18 ||
analyzed: yadi anyām manute bahu tātaḥ tat vihāya jhagiti dehi nu mātar
devi tvam śata bhāva vikalpā śūnya samādhiḥ apākṛta tulyā talpā
śūnya kṛpe sahajā dvayam uktam vajra ayajrayā
nam idam avadhi vibhaktam
bhāva abhāva samasta ākāśa vyāpī bhavati sa tattva vikāśaḥ
udbhavanti tatas eva vimokṣāḥ bodhi pakṣa nikhila pratipakṣāḥ
buddhānām āveṇika dharmaḥ sattva rāśi paripācita karmaḥ
yat vā yāna traya niryāṇam dhūma ādikam api ca aparimāṇam

original: tvadbhaktyā yadalambhi śubhaṃ me bhavatu mano bhavatīparamaṃ me |
analyzed: tvad bhaktyā śubham me bhavatu manaḥ bhavatī paramam me

original: sakalakaluṣarahitaṃ guṇasindhustvatparamaṃ hyata eva na bandhuḥ || 22 ||
analyzed: sakala kaluṣa rahitam guṇa sindhuḥ tvad paramam hi atas eva na bandhuḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam mahā paṇḍita vibhūti candra pādānām
